name: You Cannot Play Me Twice!
description:
HELLO!

THIS IS MY ITCH.IO PAGE!

YOU CAN VISIT THIS PAGE SEVERAL TIMES!

BUT...

YOU CAN PLAY ME ONLY ONCE!

ENJOY!

================================================

If you have further questions, please dont hesitate to contact me via twitter/email/comments: @eusekerci

The game is only for Windows platform, unfortunately.

If you cannot play the game for some reason, please reach me out.
I would like to cover all the edge cases for this project.
